languages.text: Среди вещей погибших обнаружена инфопластина и оружие, которое принадлежало командиру абордажной группы. На прикладе выцарапаны слова: "Надежда — яд. Убей ее, и смерть станет легкой и желанной".

A data-slate and a weapon that belonged to the commander of the boarding party were recovered from the dead men's belongings. The words "Hope is poison. Kill it, and death becomes easy and desirable" were scratched into the stock.
languages.original_text: Среди вещей погибших обнаружена инфопластина и оружие, которое принадлежало командиру абордажной группы. На прикладе выцарапаны слова: "Надежда — яд. Убей ее, и смерть станет легкой и желанной".

languages.text: Ein Datablock und eine Waffe, die dem Commander des Enterkommandos gehörte, konnten geborgen werden. Jemand hat die Worte "Hoffnung ist Gift. Töte sie und der Tod wird einfach und wünschenswert" in den Schaft geritzt.
languages.original_text: A data-slate and a weapon that belonged to the commander of the boarding party were recovered from the dead men's belongings. The words "Hope is poison. Kill it, and death becomes easy and desirable" were scratched into the stock.

traits.locale_text: Ein Datablock und eine Waffe, die dem Commander des Enterkommandos gehörte, konnten geborgen werden. Jemand hat die Worte "Hoffnung ist Gift. Töte sie und der Tod wird einfach und wünschenswert" in den Schaft geritzt.

languages.text: Une plaque de données et une arme ayant appartenu au commandant du groupe d'abordage ont été récupérées parmi les possessions des défunts. Sur la crosse sont gravés les mots suivants : « L'espoir est un poison. Tuez-le, et la mort vous paraîtra aussi facile que désirable. »
languages.original_text: A data-slate and a weapon that belonged to the commander of the boarding party were recovered from the dead men's belongings. The words "Hope is poison. Kill it, and death becomes easy and desirable" were scratched into the stock.

traits.locale_text: Une plaque de données et une arme ayant appartenu au commandant du groupe d'abordage ont été récupérées parmi les possessions des défunts. Sur la crosse sont gravés les mots suivants : « L'espoir est un poison. Tuez-le, et la mort vous paraîtra aussi facile que désirable. »

languages.text: Entre las pertenencias de los muertos se han recuperado una tablilla de datos y un arma perteneciente al comandante del grupo de abordaje. La culata tiene grabadas las siguientes palabras: «La esperanza es un veneno. Destrúyela y la muerte será fácil y deseable».
languages.original_text: A data-slate and a weapon that belonged to the commander of the boarding party were recovered from the dead men's belongings. The words "Hope is poison. Kill it, and death becomes easy and desirable" were scratched into the stock.

traits.locale_text: Entre las pertenencias de los muertos se han recuperado una tablilla de datos y un arma perteneciente al comandante del grupo de abordaje. La culata tiene grabadas las siguientes palabras: «La esperanza es un veneno. Destrúyela y la muerte será fácil y deseable».

languages.text: 死者の遺留品からは、データスレートと乗り込み部隊司令の武器が発見された。ストックには「希望は毒だ。それを殺せば、死は容易かつ望ましいものとなる」と書かれていた。
languages.original_text: A data-slate and a weapon that belonged to the commander of the boarding party were recovered from the dead men's belongings. The words "Hope is poison. Kill it, and death becomes easy and desirable" were scratched into the stock.

traits.locale_text: 死者の遺留品からは、データスレートと乗り込み部隊司令の武器が発見された。ストックには「希望は毒だ。それを殺せば、死は容易かつ望ましいものとなる」と書かれていた。

languages.text: 从登舰队队长的遗骸中，你的人找到了一块数据板和一把武器。武器的枪托上刻着这样的字样——“希望是毒药，消灭它，死亡就不再令人生畏。”
languages.original_text: A data-slate and a weapon that belonged to the commander of the boarding party were recovered from the dead men's belongings. The words "Hope is poison. Kill it, and death becomes easy and desirable" were scratched into the stock.

traits.locale_text: 从登舰队队长的遗骸中，你的人找到了一块数据板和一把武器。武器的枪托上刻着这样的字样——“希望是毒药，消灭它，死亡就不再令人生畏。”

languages.text: Ölü askerlerin eşyaları arasında bordalama ekibi komutanına ait olan bir databela ile bir silah bulundu. Yığına "Umut zehirdir. Onu öldürdüğünde ölüm daha kolay ve daha makbul gelir." cümleleri kazınmış.
languages.original_text: A data-slate and a weapon that belonged to the commander of the boarding party were recovered from the dead men's belongings. The words "Hope is poison. Kill it, and death becomes easy and desirable" were scratched into the stock.
